DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe patient characteristic drug usage among patient prescribe ticagrelor first time compare patient prescribed clopidogrel prasugrel first time . A purpose ascertain estimate crude incidence rate bleeding , arrhythmia , heart failure , acute renal failure , acute liver failure , dyspnoea gout among new user three cohort ticagrelor , clopidogrel prasugrel .
DOC.brief_title: Extended Drug Utilization Study Among Patients Exposed Ticagrelor , Clopidogrel Prasugrel
DOC.criteria: First time user ticagrelor , clopidogrel prasugrel , respectively Individuals one three antiplatelet drug dispense day
